attributes.action: DON'T extend the BBC Licence fee to Streaming Services like Netflix & Disney+.
attributes.additional_details: It has been reported that the Labour government could extend the TV Licence to streaming service subscriptions such as Netflix and Disney+. Many UK residents are switching to these alternative entertainment services as they often provide better content. It would be unfair to force people to pay into an organisation for a service that they do not use. We believe that we should have the right to choose our entertainment provider.
attributes.background: Do not extend the BBC Licence Fee to include streaming service subscriptions such as Netflix and Disney+ as there are many UK residents moving away from BBC TV, Radio and streaming service for alternative providers.

departments.name: Department for Culture, Media and Sport

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/716361
